verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Did We not soothe your heart?
verse.verse_2: And lift from you your burden.
verse.verse_4: And raised for you your reputation?
verse.verse_7: When your work is done, turn to devotion.
verse.verse_8: And to your Lord turn for everything.
